abstract: Berkshire Hathaway, the giant conglomerate run by Warren E. Buffett and Kraft’s largest shareholder, said on Tuesday that it has rejected the American food giant’s proposal to issue new shares to back up its $16 billion bid for Cadbury.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway, the giant conglomerate run by Warren E. Buffett and Kraft’s largest shareholder, said on Tuesday that it has rejected the American food giant’s proposal to issue new shares to back up its $16 billion bid for Cadbury.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway, the giant conglomerate run by Warren E. Buffett and Kraft‘s largest shareholder, said on Tuesday that it had rejected the American food giant’s proposal to issue new shares to back up its $16 billion bid for Cadbury.

headline.main: Berkshire Rejects Key Part of Kraft’s Cadbury Bid
